info.author: Imbolc
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
==============
gae-virtualenv
==============

Using virtualenv with zipimport on Google App Engine.


Installation
============

Copy build dir to you gae application root directory.


Usage
=====

1. Edit build/pipreq.txt and run: 
::

    $ cd build
    $ ./buildenv.sh
    $ python ziping.py
    
2. Modify the load path at the top of each handler script:
::

    import sys
    sys.path.insert(0, 'virtualenv.zip')

3. Add build directory to skip_files in app.yaml
::

    skip_files:
        - ^(.*/)?build/.*
info.name: gae-virtualenv
info.summary: Using virtualenv with zipimport on Google App Engine
info.html_description:
Using virtualenv with zipimport on Google App Engine.

Installation

Copy build dir to you gae application root directory.

Usage

1. Edit build/pipreq.txt and run:

$ cd build
$ ./buildenv.sh
$ python ziping.py

2. Modify the load path at the top of each handler script:

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, 'virtualenv.zip')

3. Add build directory to skip_files in app.yaml

skip_files:
    - ^(.*/)?build/.*
